oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Earl Scruggs - 2004-09-29 - set two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Fourth of four Artist in Residence performances by Earl Scruggs from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 29, 2004. Set two of two. Special guests include: Gary Scruggs, Glen Duncan, Eddie Bayers, Rob Ickes, John Jorgenson, Bryan Sutton, Jon Randall Stewart, Charlie Daniels.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Earl Scruggs; Gary Scruggs; Glen Duncan; Eddie Bayers; Rob Ickes; John Jorgenson; Bryan Sutton; Jon Randall Stewart; Charlie Daniels;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Opening comments by Kyle Young. Performances include: Wildwood Flower (Earl Scruggs - guitar) -- You Are My Flower (Earl Scruggs - guitar, Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- Paul And Silas (Earl Scruggs - guitar, Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- Rolling In My Sweet Baby's Arms (Earl Scruggs - banjo, Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- Step It Up And Go (Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- The Ballad Of Jed Clampett (John Jorgenson - vocal) -- Introduction of Charlie Daniels -- Down The Road (Charlie Daniels - vocal) -- I'll Fly Away (Charlie Daniels - fiddle and vocal) -- Foggy Mountain Breakdown (Earl Scruggs - banjo) -- Program End -- Short Recording Pause -- Encore -- Sitting On Top Of The World (Charlie Daniels - vocal) -- Lonesome Reuben.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Scruggs, Earl; Scruggs, Gary; Duncan,Glen; Ickes, Rob; Bayers, Eddie; Stewart, Jon Randall; Jorgenson, John; Sutton, Bryan; Daniels, Charlie;
